data.title: Fingers and toes!
data.text:
Love this nail salon! Have been here a few times and they do a great job! 
Pedis are amazing the give the best foot and leg massage! At least five minutes! They really care about their work, always done with expertise!
I will always return here! Also great hours too!

data.title: My wife says this is the best in the area.
data.text: My wife goes often, and when ever I ask what would she like before we go out to a meeting, or an outing, this is what she wants. " Nails, feet and a spa". The only problem is they are many time booked up for the time she wants to go!

data.title: Confirm the price
data.text: The services were great but I was disappointed when I was billed more than the price on the website. I asked the receptionist about it but I don't think she knew how to correct it. I will not be going back.

data.title: Beautiful experience
data.text: Great pedicure and a very relaxing environment. Very attentive to my needs.

data.title: wonderful massage
data.text: i was there week ago i got the best hot stone massage.Agnes is the best

data.title: Best place in Chicago- I know I've tried them all.
data.text:
I get my nails done there every three weeks. Premium nail salon unlike any other i've been too. It is well worth it. I get LCN nails and they are consistently perfect. Just recenrly got a pedicure and two weeks later my nails still look perfect. I recommend this salon to all of my friends and the tons of people that compliment my nails. 
I've had my share of cheap strip mall nail salons. This one is the best in chicago. I have tried almost every decent and high end nail salon in the chicago land area, read tons of reiews and have done my research. After one place lets me down, I look and try another one. And this salon wont go out of business because there are tons of clients with standing appointments. All nail care and more in one place.

data.title: Wonderful Facial
data.text:
This salon may be hard to find, but it is on the east side of Roselle Rd., just north of Schaumburg Road.  There is parking that wraps around the series of stores and the entrance to the salon faces the parking lot, not the street.
 
The salon was smallish, but the staff was wonderful.  I have been to Mario Tricoci a few times in the past for facials, and the service that I received here was far better.  The technician was very thorough, explained what she was doing and why, and there was no pressure to buy specific products after the session.  My skin looks and feels great.

I would highly recommend this location for facials, and I plan on returning again.
